Legal_Issue: Whether the PRRA officer unreasonably disregarded evidence
Credibility_Assessment: Ms. Augusto's evidence given little weight due to lack of credibility
Evidence_Type: Notification, letter, news articles, documentary evidence of amnesty and improved human rights
Legal_Provision: IRPA provisions on protection claims and PRRA
Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution in Angola due to cousin's murder and mother's imprisonment
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credible documentary evidence showing improved conditions in Angola
Application_Factor: Discretion of PRRA officer in weighing evidence
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPA rules on PRRA and evidence assessment
Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient credible evidence to support fear of persecution
Evidentiary_Issues: Weight assigned to applicant's evidence vs. country condition reports
Credibility_Issues: Applicant's evidence not found credible in light of official documentation
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of PRRA officer's decision
Procedural_Issue: Scope of judicial review of PRRA decisions
